content.title: Create the Registration Form
content.body:
1. From the Project Explorer, expand Mobile > Forms and select frmRegistration. 
  2. From the lower-left corner of Iris, navigate to the Default Library.
  3. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon. Click the search icon .
  4. In the search bar that appears, enter ACMERegister.
  5. Drag the ACMERegister component and drop it onto frmRegistration on the canvas.

In the next few cards, we will be adding validations for this Registration Screen.
